howTitle: How to win the jackpot in 3 steps?

howSteps.title: Connect wallet and deposit 30POL
howSteps.text: Your 30POL instantly tops up the pool and you automatically join the draw for 90% of the pool.

howSteps.title: Wait for your star moment
howSteps.text: The pool grows with each participant, increasing your potential prize. The draw happens when the pool is filled.

howSteps.title: Victory!
howSteps.text: The smart contract using Chainlink VRF picks a random winner. Prize is automatically sent to the wallet. Results are tamper-proof.
